MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 and LL14 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in New Broughton, Caego, Bersham and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations as to the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:10AM 24th February 2021
